DataElement.preferredName: Past 4 Week Reduced Careful Emotion Problem Reason Yes No Coded Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Coded indicator to signify whether a person reported either not working or doing activities as carefully as usual as a result of emotional problems during the past four weeks.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Past 4 Week Reduced Careful Emotion Problem Reason
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Before the present time._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::4_Any period of seven consecutive days._Made less in size or amount or degree._The act or process of concentrating, focusing the attention and mental energy on a single object to the exclusion of others._That aspect of consciousness devoted to affect or feeling; a strong feeling, aroused mental state, or intense state of drive or unrest directed toward a definite object, with physiological, somatic, and behavioral components._A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Past Integer::4 Week Reduced Attention Concentration
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Before the present time.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::4:Any period of seven consecutive days.:Made less in size or amount or degree.:The act or process of concentrating, focusing the attention and mental energy on a single object to the exclusion of others.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
Any period of seven consecutive days.
Made less in size or amount or degree.
The act or process of concentrating, focusing the attention and mental energy on a single object to the exclusion of others.

Property.preferredDefinition: That aspect of consciousness devoted to affect or feeling; a strong feeling, aroused mental state, or intense state of drive or unrest directed toward a definite object, with physiological, somatic, and behavioral components.:A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution.:An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

Concepts.definition: That aspect of consciousness devoted to affect or feeling; a strong feeling, aroused mental state, or intense state of drive or unrest directed toward a definite object, with physiological, somatic, and behavioral components.
A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution.
An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: information on quality of patient life and ability to function

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Yes or No response to a question coded as 1 (Yes) or 2 (No).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
